title: Immortal Beacon Amidst the Dragon Tempest
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, cinematic lighting, ultra detailed, 16:9 aspect ratio. An epic Fantasy Xianxia scene featuring a towering ancient lighthouse built upon a rugged, isolated cliff surrounded by massive, violent turquoise waves. The lighthouse structure is reinforced with glowing cyan crystals and emanates a powerful azure light. Above, a furious dark storm swirls, illuminated by intense, jagged lightning strikes, some manifesting as serpentine lightning dragons soaring through the tempestuous sky. Floating golden and cerulean ancient Xianxia runes/sigils descend like rain around the tower. A solitary Xianxia cultivator with long white hair and flowing robes stands on a nearby precipice, holding a glowing staff, observing the chaotic power. Dramatic atmosphere, high contrast, deep ocean colors, epic scale.
